name: Mosquito (M5StickCplus)
description:
WIFI Scan/Deauth:
- WIFI SCANNER (View wifi information and connected MAC addresses)
- WIFI ANALYZER (Draws the wifi network and shows the chennal)
- WIFI DEAUTHER (Deauthentication of all wifi network users)

WIFI Phishing captive portal:
- WIFI FREE (simple) or (google)
- WIFI CLONE (simple) or (google)
OBS: Credentials are saved in 8.8.4.4/pass (NO SDCARD REQUIRED)

Packet Monitor:
- Packet Sniffer (Shows packet information from nearby networks every second)
- MAC Sniffer (Shows all nearby MAC addresses)
- Deauth Detector (Detects deauthentication attacks)

TV Gone: Turns off most TVs and infrared devices
Language: Portugues | English

What's new v1.1:
1- Now it is possible to stop TV Gone by clicking the button
2- The captive portal now shows the saved location of the captured login (8.8.4.4/pass)

name: NemoFirmware - latest EN n0xa version
description:
#TV B-Gone port (thanks to MrArm's HAKRWATCH) to shut off many infrared-controlled TVs, projectors and other devices
#AppleJuice iOS Bluetooth device pairing spam
#Bluetooth device notification spamming for SwiftPair (Windows) and Android
#WiFi Spam - Funny SSIDs, WiFi Rickrolling, and a Random mode that creates hundreds of randomly-named SSIDs per minute
#WiFi NEMO Portal - A captive portal that tries to social engineer email credentials - saves usernames and passwords to SD Card (if inserted into a supported reader)
#WiFi SSID Scanner - Display 2.4 GHz SSIDs nearby, get information about them, and even clone the SSIDs in NEMO Portal
#User-adjustable 24 Hour digital clock backed by the M5 Stick RTC so it holds relatively stable time even in deep sleep and low battery mode
#EEPROM-backed Settings for rotation, brightness, automatic dimming and NEMO Portal SSID
#Battery level and credits in settings menu

name: Portal Evil HUEBR
description:
This is a fork code do https://github.com/n0xa/

Moded BY: https://github.com/devotaviocc/ Moded BY: https://github.com/raphntc/

en-US

Hiding in plain sight, Wi-Fi honeypots are deceitful wireless networks masquerading as legitimate hotspots. They act like digital sirens, luring unsuspecting users with the promise of free internet access. But behind this facade lies a sinister reality: a trap designed to steal your data or infect your devices with malicious software. These honey traps, often deployed by hackers and cybercriminals, exploit the public's insatiable thirst for free Wi-Fi, turning our desire for connection into a vulnerability.

This is an Evil Portal developed for the M5STICK C PLUS

pt-BR

Escondidos à vista de todos, os honeypots Wi-Fi são redes sem fio enganosas que se disfarçam de hotspots legítimos. Eles agem como sirenes digitais, atraindo usuários desavisados com a promessa de acesso gratuito à Internet. Mas por trás dessa fachada existe uma realidade sinistra: uma armadilha projetada para roubar seus dados ou infectar seus dispositivos com software malicioso. Estas armadilhas, frequentemente utilizadas por hackers e cibercriminosos, exploram a sede insaciável do público por Wi-Fi gratuito, transformando o nosso desejo de ligação numa vulnerabilidade.

Este é um Portal Evil desenvolvido para o M5STICK PLUS!

Para vizualizar as credenciais acesse: https://172.0.0.1/creds (Lembrando que precisa estar conectado na rede :v)

author: fiero

name: ESP32 Marauder for M5Stick C Plus (Screen works)
description:
The latest updated version of ESP32Maurauder with SD Card support and some much needed changes to the on-screen menu. More features work, but there are still a few things that aren't fully operational. I was able to get PCAPs stored to the SD Card for offline cracking, so that's a start.

You have to build your own SD Card adapter to plug into the M5Stick C Plus. To wire this up, you can get any generic Arduino/esp32 SPI MicroSD slot with 6 pins. 

StickCPlus Header - SPI SD Card Reader
             3v3   -   3v3
              GND   -   GND
               G0   -   CLK
          G36/G25   -   MISO
              G26   -   MOSI
                       
CS on the reader should be jumpered to GND

Known issues:
Recommend using external power. When the battery voltage drops, even a little, some brands of SD Cards stop working properly and could get corrupted.
No touch screen, so you can only use the "next" key (side button) and "select" key (M5 button on the front) to navigate
author: 4x0nn

name: FStick For M5StickCPlus
description:
This is a simple project to play around with the M5StickC Plus trying to mimic a flipper zero functionality. Its packs many features listed below.
Please check the github repository for further information https://github.com/IMXNOOBX/fstick and DOCS here: https://docs.imxnoobx.com/fstick

- IR Controller: Spam IR codes to control TVs and other devices.
- Wifi Utilities: Scan, spam, clone, deauth and manipulate access points.
- Bluetooth Utilities: Spam BLE signals for Apple, Android, Windows, and more.
- Settings: Control battery saver, sound, LED, and device power.

FStick is a work in progress, open for contributions. Discover its potential and share your ideas!

name: CircuitPython For M5Stick C Plus
description:
CircuitPython has a web-based workflow and USB serial terminal. 
On serial terminal, use the following example to configure wifi and your device's web password:

f = open('settings.toml', 'w')
f.write('CIRCUITPY_WIFI_SSID = "wifissid"\n')
f.write('CIRCUITPY_WIFI_PASSWORD = "wifipassword"\n')
f.write('CIRCUITPY_WEB_API_PASSWORD = "webpassword"\n')
f.close()

name: RoverC (not Pro) StickC Plus
description: Fixed version that works on old Rover C (not a pro one with gripper) and StickC Plus
author: dag2ww@gmail.com

name: M5StickCPlus指纹管理器
description: M5StickCPlus指纹管理器使用M5StickCPlus对F1020SC指纹识别模块进行指纹的增删与识别操作。单击G39进行指纹ID管理，默认ID为0单击ID加1，长按G39删除所有指纹；单击G37识别指纹，双击G37添加指纹，长按G37当前ID的指纹。注意：本项目仅能使用M5StickCPlus与M5StickCPlus指纹识别功能底座F1020SC搭配使用；指纹添加完成后可以使用flow进行快速项目开发
author: peien

name: M5StickC PLUS语音助理
description:
M5StickC PLUS语音助理，按下M5StickC PLUS板载按钮37（按下开始录音，松开停止录音）可识别语音，发送到巴法云MQTT主题postvoice，同时订阅主题feedback可显示该主题消息，通过Nodered可实现语音万物（例如：语音说开灯，Nodered订阅postvoice主题收到消息后判断语音命令关键词执行开灯操作后，返回灯已打开……更多好玩用途等你开启）第一次使用需要通过M5Burner配置网络与腾讯云与巴法云账号，配置参数如下：
SSID WiFi名称
PASS WiFi密码
secretId 腾讯云SecretId
secretKey 腾讯云secretKey
client_id 巴法云私钥

腾讯云语音识别说明网址
https://cloud.tencent.com/product/asr
巴法云物联网平台地址
https://cloud.bemfa.com/?action=u_out
Nodered官网
https://nodered.org/
author: peien

name: M5StickC Plus Resistor Calculator
description: A very simple M5Stick C Plus colour-ring resistor calculator
author: IcingTomato

name: IrRemoteController
description:
IR remote control for Sony cameras.
Button A        -> Shutter
Button B(M5) -> Mode change(1shot/2s timer)

Please enable the "Infrared remote control" function of the camera before use.

Operation confirmed cameras:
*ILCE-7M4
*ILCE-7RM4
Please let me know if there is a camera that has been confirmed to work.
Twtter: @hide4849
author: hide4849

name: IrRemoteController_LowPower
description:
IR remote control for Sony cameras.
Button A(M5) -> Shutter

Please enable the "Infrared remote control" function of the camera before use.

This version is in deep sleep all the time.
Press the M5 button to wake it up and send an IR.
Deep sleep after transmission.

Operation confirmed cameras:
*ILCE-7M4
*ILCE-7RM4
Please let me know if there is a camera that has been confirmed to work.
Twtter: @hide4849
author: hide4849

name: M5StickC_WebRadio_Radiko_Avatar
description:
You can listen to radiko with M5StickC Plus.
Note: Can only be used in Japan.
M5StickC PlusとスピーカーHatが必要です。
M5Stack BasicやFIRE、Core2でも動くようにしました。
機種は自動的に識別します。
Wi-Fiの設定はSmartConfigを使用、
iOSかAndroidの「Espressif Esptouch」アプリから設定します。
ボタンA：選曲　ボタンA長押し：音量＋　ボタンB：音量ー
0.1.1：Core2 v1.1とM5StickC Plus2に対応。
